meta_title: Padel Speaker: Score Announcer — Apple Watch App
meta_description: Padel Speaker announces your score out loud through a Bluetooth speaker. Track games and sets on your Apple Watch — no phone needed.
hero_sub: Padel Speaker announces every point, game, and set through your Bluetooth speaker — so you can focus on the court, not the score.
cta_aria: Download Padel Speaker on the App Store
feat1_desc: Pair any Bluetooth speaker directly from your Apple Watch in seconds.
feat2_desc: Set your match format — games, sets, tiebreaks — right from your wrist.
feat3_desc: Score announces automatically after every point. Hands-free, hassle-free.
feat4_desc: Follow the full set-by-set progression of your match at a glance.
cta_banner_sub: Download for Apple Watch and connect your speaker.
